title: 怎么发射一个名“1”的雪球并变成火球，而普通雪球却不能

replies.author: skeleton小白
replies.txt_content:
你的意思是扔出去的雪球实体名字是1还是手上拿的物品雪球名字是1

如果是前一种情况
rcb:/execute @e[type=Snowball,name=1] ~ ~ ~ summon Fireball ~ ~ ~ {direction:[0.0,0.0,0.0],ExplosionPower:0}复制代码


如果是后一种稍微麻烦点

rcb:
/scoreboard players tag @a add hold {SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:snowball",tag:{display:{Name:"1"}}}}复制代码
ccb:
/execute @a[tag=hold] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Snowball,c=1,r=2] ~ ~ ~ summon Fireball ~ ~ ~ {direction:[0.0,0.0,0.0],ExplosionPower:0}复制代码
ccb:
/scoreboard players tag @a remove hold复制代码

望采纳

replies.author: 冰凌暮雨
replies.txt_content:
用高频的命令方块:
 /execute @e[type=Snowball,name=1] ~ ~ ~ summon Fireball ~ ~ ~
意思是当有一个名字为1的雪球存在时，在雪球所在的位置生成一个火焰弹,然后雪球碰到火焰弹消失,并把火焰弹弹出去～
